Reviews.Title: the camera and bundled accessories bought from Cameta Camera are excellent
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: comparing other sellers selling the same camera at $699, this bundle added extra $15 (I bought at $714 in November 2013) for a bunch of useful accessories, as 32G SD card and spare battery are apparently of great value, the external flash, filters and tripod helped learning photography to improve, for indoor studio photography, or UV/CPL/ND filters for landscapethe camera itself provided great images quality, as reviewed by most cameras review site, pictures look more crisp, up to ISO3200 I don't see obvious blurring,the wifi feature is also good for transferring photos to smartphone (with a smartphone app), or to PC auto save software, this helped everyday with fuji x-m1 becomes cableless, always transfer photos wireless.the only drawback is focusing is not as fast as Sony NEX-5R as I used before, same as pointed out by most reviews, but I prefer this fuji x-m1 other than sony nex-5r for its image quality.
